title: The Magic of Music: Relaxing Music Playlist | Wellness Center | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: "Researchers found that listening to and playing music increase the body's production of the antibody immunoglobulin A and natural killer cells — the cells that attack invading viruses and boost the immune system's effectiveness. Music also reduces levels of the stress hormone cortisol."
"Researchers are exploring how music therapy can improve health outcomes among a variety of patient populations, including premature infants and people with depression and Parkinson's disease."
Check out the full link to this article here! https://www.apa.org/monitor/2013/11/music

This is why we are choosing to hook you up with the best sounds out there to help you de-stress, unwind as well as promoting focus and studying. (There's music for it all) Whether you like chill ambient music, nature sounds, and or funky piano or hip hop tunes, these playlists are for you!
Bonus:  Most videos are aesthetically pleasing, so put them on full screen and have them play in the background while you're doing your thing!
Check out these videos to learn about the power of music and how it can positively affect your wellbeing!
Check out these videos and their aesthetic video backgrounds to help lower your heart rate and unwind. Play this music whenever you want to escape reality and relax!
Check out these relaxing videos to help you study and focus. Nothing’s better than creating alpha waves when studying!
